item.title: Goku or Vegeta - Who do you like the most?
item.description: Ever felt the need to have an endless debate! ðŸ˜€ Well, if you are a Dragonball fan then perhaps this could just be the ideal topic ðŸ˜† I remember watching the first episode on TV back in high school and ever since then I have watched the various sagas multiple times. Each character in the anime is amazing but many of us would always remember the most prominent ones. So, basically as a part of this anime we have two main characters namely : Goku (Son Goku)
